meanings.definition: Greater in size, extent, or quantity than something else.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was vaster than the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The ocean is vaster than a pond.
meanings.sent3: The cake was vaster than the plate it was served on.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was vaster than the universe.
meanings.sent5: The mountain range loomed vaster than any other natural wonder.

meanings.definition: More extensive or comprehensive in scope or range.
meanings.sent1: His knowledge of history was vaster than hers.
meanings.sent2: The library's collection is vaster than I imagined.
meanings.sent3: The to-do list seemed vaster than the time available.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination was vaster than the universe itself.
meanings.sent5: The possibilities for the future are vaster than we can comprehend.
